text: Carurú Airport () is an airport serving the river town of Carurú in the Vaupés Department of Colombia. The runway parallels the Vaupés River, an eventual tributary of the Amazon River. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Carurú *OurAirports - Carurú *FallingRain - Carurú Airport *HERE/Nokia - Carurú * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Carurú Airport
